books.Title: The Lord of the Rings
books.Author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.Description: An epic high-fantasy novel that follows the quest to destroy the One Ring.

books.Title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
books.Author: J.K. Rowling
books.Description: The first book in the Harry Potter series, following the young wizard's first year at Hogwarts.

books.Title: Project Hail Mary
books.Author: Andy Weir
books.Description: A lone astronaut must save humanity from extinction in this gripping interstellar adventure from the author of The Martian. Ryland Grace awakens with no memory on a spaceship far from Earth, and must use his scientific ingenuity to accomplish an impossible mission.
